name: Stoneskin, Communal
components: V, S, M (granite and diamond dust worth 250 gp per creature affected)
text: This spell functions like stoneskin, except you divide the duration in 10 minute intervals among the creatures touched. Once the spell has prevented 10 points of damage per caster level (maximum 150 points) for a subject, the spell’s effects end for that subject.
duration_zh: 10分钟/等级 或 直至耗散
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
